ComicInfo.Summary:
It's story time at Grandma Duck's farm, and this time Uncle Scrooge tells Donald and the nephews how he made his sixth million dollars in the appropriately-titled "My Sixth Million." Then, what should be a simple business deal for Uncle Scrooge instead becomes "The Dessert Disaster." So end the year with two stories guaranteed to satisfy your sweet tooth before another year of new-to-the-U.S. stories begins!
Story TitlesMy Sixth Million (from Italian Topolino #2703, 2007)The Dessert Disaster (from Italian Topolino #3071, 2014)*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Marco Mazzarello | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Giorgio Cavazzano (a) & Luca Merli (c) | 2 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Chris Cerasi, Denton J. Tipton, Elizabeth Brei
ComicInfo.Characters: Albert Quackmore, Dewey, Donald Duck, Grandma Duck, Huey, Louie, Miss Quackfaster, Uncle Scrooge
